summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganIt's time to get glowing! ICONIC London's Prep-Set-Glow Hydrating Setting Spray is a gorgeous hydrating mist that feels refreshing and contains light reflecting properties that leaves the skin with ICONIC's glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis wonder spray has extracts of cucumber and chamomile¬†which will¬†give you a stand out gloss.If that isn't enough its also rich in Antioxidants, Green Tea and Vitamin E which helps to condition your skin and not forgetting caffeine which can aid in combatting dark circles around your eyes.This hero product is going to leave your skin revitalized and glowing.Item 2536945How To UseTo use simply shake well then spray 12" away from the face with your eyes closed.Need to look your best? Use Prep-Set-Glow to hydrate your skin overnight. Simply mist before bed as the final part of your bedtime beauty regime.Step 1: Shake the bottle for 5 seconds to reveal luminosity.Step 2: For the best results, close your eyes and, using sweeping motions, mist evenly across your face.Step 3: Allow to dry and get ready for some beauty sleep.IngredientsAqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To use simply shake well then spray 12" away from the face with your eyes closed.Need to look your best? Use Prep-Set-Glow to hydrate your skin overnight. Simply mist before bed as the final part of your bedtime beauty regime.Step 1: Shake the bottle for 5 seconds to reveal luminosity.Step 2: For the best results, close your eyes and, using sweeping motions, mist evenly across your face.Step 3: Allow to dry and get ready for some beauty sleep.

reviews.headline: A Failure
reviews.comments: Product dried out my skin & it didn't provide a glow. Plus Ulta online makes it difficult to return items.

reviews.headline: Great product but‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I love the formula but the packaging needs work. There is a learning curve to this sprayer. If I don't have ot angled roght I get too much in one area and it gets into my eyes while I wait for it to dry. Other than that it works well to melt my makeup together. And I do not feel greasy once dry.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I am not the type to wear whole face makeup only on special occasions. I just fill in brows, conceal my eyes, a little mascara, and a lip tint. Spray this setting, Spray and I'm ready! It makes my face look healthy it glows. I first received this Spray in the diamond member gift bag but I'm hooked. I wasn't surprised they sold out. No need to look elsewhere, it just goes with me. I had to order 3, just in case. Try it!

reviews.headline: If you like dewy and not sticky this is for you!!
reviews.comments: I love glowy products! But I've tried some that feel tacky, sticky, and look so greasy but this is really the perfect glow! Makes my makeup last all day, one time  I went out of town and forgot my primer and used this as a primer and it worked so well! This product literally makes my makeup look flawless and the perfectly glowy and healthy, I 100% recommend this wonderful setting spray!

reviews.headline: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
reviews.comments: I LOVE THE GLOW THAT IT GIVES, AND IT HOLDS MY MAKEUP IN PLACE

reviews.headline: Staple in my beauty routine!
reviews.comments: I use this to fix my makeup. The glow it gives is so pretty! The mist is jusy right and totally refreshing. Put a towel over your chest, otherwise your clothes will he sparkly!

reviews.headline: Loveeeeee
reviews.comments: This is my fav product with and without makeup. Makes my skin glow and is the perfect shimmer. Sets makeup really well and adds moisture back when makeup is on to look less cakey. And the darker one is very bronze glow while normal one is like a fresh moisturizing glow.

reviews.headline: This Is So Goodü©∑
reviews.comments: I love this! I got it for my birthday with a gift card. This stuff is so pretty and doesnt leave that icky feeling on your face!

reviews.headline: Simply the best
reviews.comments: I love this for tanning my face, neck, and chest. I exfoliate often and this is a breeze to reapply. It absorbs quickly and i dont ever notice any chunky glitter anywhere.

reviews.headline: Horrible smell
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this spray. I have very sensitive skin and when I tested it out on the inside of my wrist I could not get past the old lady perfume smell. It's very strong and lingers. Showered soon after to remove the scent. Disappointed because it has a pretty glow to it.

reviews.headline: Horrible mist
reviews.comments: This mist is not light or misty by any means. Even with holding it 12 in away from my face, one spray is so heavy that the product starts dripping down my face. Perhaps my bottle is defective?

reviews.headline: had allergic reaction :(
reviews.comments: I really loved the shimmer of this product as it was exactly what I was looking for, so I was super disappointed when I realized I was having an allergic reaction to it. The spray created small red bumps all over the affected areas :(

reviews.headline: Lovely product
reviews.comments: I love this setting spray.  It left my skin  looking illuminated even till the end of the day.  Have to shake it very well.  Way better than the Urban Decay illuminating one.

reviews.headline: very nice
reviews.comments: I don't like the glitter look but this is just a light glistening.

reviews.headline: Made my chin itchy
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product so much. It does create a beautiful glow. However it made my chin and lower jaw itchy and red. I definitely think it's the scent. I will go back to Fenty.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I use it everyday. Keep my make up in place and adds a nice glow. I recommend

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: I am on my third bottle. I feel like the bottle last a while since you only need a couple sprays each time. I love the shine and the Dewey look it gives you. It's so pretty and my favorite setting spray I've ever used.

reviews.headline: Best prep and setting spray ever!
reviews.comments: I have used all the shades, I am 44 and my skin is a bit dry this makes my face look so dewy , glowing youthful! I gets compliments what foundation are you using recently ever since I started using this. It's not the foundation it's the spray. I love the light fragrance it is just all around my favorite smell spray ever. I even use it on my bare skin.

reviews.headline: In Regard to Both Sets
reviews.comments: Got both the Original and the Glow set. Have to use 2-3 spritz for the sparkles to show, but is an otherwise good product. It does, however, have a bit of a chemical smell.

reviews.headline: LOVE THE PRODUCT HATE THE PACKAGING!
reviews.comments: This spray is amazing! If you like a dewy look this is the setting spray you HOWEVER the atomizer (sprayer, nozzle) on this is ridiculous! Its so aggressive sprays wayyy too heavily AND it stopped working after a while. For the price youd think they give a decent atomizer but NO! I had to pour the liquid into another bottle to be able to use it cuz the nozzle just stopped spraying like it should.

faceoff_positive.comments: As a makeup enthusiast with a keen interest in skincare, I'm always on the lookout for products that not only enhance my beauty routine but also nourish and protect my skin. The Iconic London Prep-Set-Glow Hydrating Setting Spray has quickly become a staple in my beauty regimen. Its multi-use functionality makes it incredibly versatile, serving as both a makeup primer and a finishing spray. I've found that it effectively preps my skin before makeup application, creating a smooth canvas and extending the wear of my foundation. Additionally, as a setting spray, it locks in my makeup all day, ensuring a flawless finish. The infusion of cucumber and chamomile extracts not only imparts a refreshing sensation but also leaves my skin feeling hydrated and revitalized. Moreover, the inclusion of antioxidants, green tea, and vitamin E provides added nourishment, while caffeine helps combat dark circles, making it a skincare essential for busy days and late nights. Using the Iconic London Prep-Set-Glow Setting Spray is truly a sensorial delight. The fine mist envelops my skin in a refreshing veil, awakening my senses with its subtle cucumber scent. Its lightweight texture feels weightless on the skin, imparting a dewy glow without any stickiness or residue. I love the luminous finish it provides, adding a touch of radiance to my complexion that lasts throughout the day. Each spritz is like a revitalizing burst of hydration, leaving me feeling invigorated and ready to take on the day. Whether you're prepping your skin for makeup application, setting your finished look, or simply refreshing your bare face, this setting spray delivers on its promises. Beauty enthusiasts, skincare aficionados, and makeup artists alike will appreciate its versatility and transformative effects. Incorporating it into your beauty routine is sure to elevate your glow game to iconic levels. It's become a must-have in my makeup bag, and I can't wait to continue incorporating it into my daily routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Achieving Radiant Skin with Iconic London Prep-Set

faceoff_negative.comments: I was SO excited to buy this Iconic London facial setting spray that looked like it would be "special"...kind of used for special occasions.  I went on ahead and purchased it (in my monthly Boxycharm subscription box) and I truly looked forward to when I could use it because it had shimmer/glitter and so much glow.  But as soon as I sprayed it on my face I instantly got a migraine!!!  I could not wait to get my makeup off that night and just be free of that strong smell...it was really disappointing!!  I wish it had been packaged that it was very scented and I would have stayed far away...Come on marketing reps...this info needs to be put on the packaging for us that are scent sensitive..and wish we was not this way!!!  I could not "return" this item as it was in my subscription box with Boxycharm...so it is a total loss for me!!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Fragrance way too strong...why use fragrance in facial spray
